phrs.translation: 依据职权, 依职权, 美国专业速干品牌, 从官职来的
履行职责, 履行职责英语

sentences.sentence: Our traditional model of proceeding is regarded as the super-ex officio doctrine.
sentences.translation: 我国传统的诉讼模式被认为是超职权主义的。

sentences.sentence: The general manager is the legal representative of the futures exchange, and is an ex officio director.
sentences.translation: 总经理是期货交易所的法定代表人，总经理是当然理事。

sentences.sentence: The ex officio license of the new inventions and creations accomplished by the licenser in the performance of contracts or any other provisions;
sentences.translation: 合同履行期间，让与人就其完成的新的发明创造对受让人的当然许可或者其他约定；
